option.wildtoolaccess.last_swapped_out_f: tool that got swapped out last time will be in first slot
option.wildtoolaccess.move_if_next_empty: item to get swapped out will go in slot to the right, if it's empty
tooltip.wildtoolaccess.mouse_select: left clicking selects the current item

tooltip.wildtoolaccess.move_if_next_empt: see config file for further info

tooltip.wildtoolaccess.access_2: see config file for further info
